info.title: Preventative Maintenance APIs
info.description:
# PRM-REST-API
API documentation for **Preventative Maintenance** related screens provided by CMiC

_Note: These APIs can only be accessed if already a customer of CMiC._

AccTypeCode.description: Account Type. Must be a valid Account Type in CMiC (ie. A,L,O,R,E)

TaskDescription.description: More detailed description of the task

TaskMteamCode.description: Team assigned to this task Reference table PRMTEAM (PTEAM_CODE)

TaskActiveFlag.description: Schedule this task only if this flag = 1

TaskGroupTaskFlag.description: 1 – Yes, 0 – No. If set (1) create a work item for the equipment class.

TaskWiccLabCompCode.description: Company code for the labor work item cost code Reference table PRMWICOSTCODE (WICC_COMP_CODE)

TaskWiccLabCode.description: Work item cost code for labor Reference table PRMWICOSTCODE (WICC_CODE)

TaskWiccMatCompCode.description: Company code for the material work item cost code Reference table PRMWICOSTCODE (WICC_COMP_CODE)

TaskWiccMatCode.description: Work item cost code for material Reference table PRMWICOSTCODE (WICC_CODE)

TaskWiccConCompCode.description: Company code for the contractor work item cost code Reference table PRMWICOSTCODE (WICC_COMP_CODE)

TaskWiccConCode.description: Work item cost code for contractor Reference table PRMWICOSTCODE (WICC_CODE)

TaskWiccEqCompCode.description: Company code for the equipment work item cost code Reference table PRMWICOSTCODE (WICC_COMP_CODE)

TaskWiccEqCode.description: Work item cost code for equipment Reference table PRMWICOSTCODE (WICC_CODE)

TaskWiccOthCompCode.description: Company code for the other work item cost code Reference table PRMWICOSTCODE (WICC_COMP_CODE)

TaskWiccOthCode.description: Work item cost code for other Reference table PRMWICOSTCODE (WICC_CODE)

TaskClass1.description: User defined classifier for filtering reports/generation workitems

TaskClass2.description: User defined classifier for filtering reports/generation workitems

TaskClass3.description: User defined classifier for filtering reports/generation workitems

TaskClass4.description: User defined classifier for filtering reports/generation workitems

TaskSrcCompCode.description: Source Company Code for Job or Department

TaskJobCode.description: Job Code for Job type tasks

TaskPhsCode.description: Job Phase Code for Job type tasks

TaskDeptCode.description: Department Code for GL type tasks

TaskTypeCode.description: ‘PRM’ for Eqp or Prm tasks, ‘CRM’ for others

WitmWorkItemType.description: What this work item is based on., ‘ EQ’ for Equipment, ‘JB’ for Job, or ‘GL’

WitmTaskPtgtType.description: The type of target for the task

WitmWoStepTitle.description: Name of an item or object

WitmDeadlineDate.description: Latest date the task can be performed

WitmThresholdDate.description: Earliest date the task should be performed

WitmRecurringFlag.description: Flag with values of ‘0’ (one-time event) and ‘1’ (recurring event)

WitmDeadlineReading.description: Accumulator Reading when this must be done

WitmAcumTypeCode.description: Unit of measurement of the accumulator

WitmNoticePrtCnt.description: Notice print count  default should be 0

WitmClass1.description: User defined classifier for filtering reports/generation workitems

WitmClass2.description: User defined classifier for filtering reports/generation workitems

WitmClass3.description: User defined classifier for filtering reports/generation workitems

WitmClass4.description: User defined classifier for filtering reports/generation workitems

WitmActiveFlag.description: Y/N If set, work item will be included into automatic work order generation

WitmSrcCompCode.description: Source Company Code for Job or Department

WitmJobCode.description: Job Code for Job type work items

WitmPhsCode.description: Job Phase Code for Job type work items

WitmDeptCode.description: Department Code for GL type work items

WitmPriority.description: Work Item priority., 1 – Critical, 2 – Normal, 3 – Low, 4 - Lowest.

WitmIssueId.description: The issue this work item was created from

WitmScheduleEndDate.description: The scheduled end date for the work item (Delivery Management)

WitmBillingType.description: DM Field., ‘T’ - Time and Materials, ‘F’ - Fixed Price, ‘N’ - Not Billed

WitmSubmittedBillingFlag.description: When ‘Y’, the work item has been submitted for billing

WitmBillingAmt.description: The total billing amount for Fixed Fee type work items

WitmBillingStateCode.description: The work item billing state., ‘NR’ - Not Yet Ready to be Billed, ‘SB’ - Submitted for Billing, ‘FB’ - Submitted for Final Billing, ‘C’ - Closed

GenericError.description: An error occurred while attempting to retrieve, create, or delete record(s)
